general.about: I create business processes that connect people with the data they need to drive operational improvements.

sideProjects.heading: inreach
sideProjects.description: Designed, prototyped, and pitched a CRM app for my introductory informatics class.
sideProjects.title: inreach

sideProjects.heading: Houserules
sideProjects.description: Caltech Hacktech Hackathon subission. Led the ideation + design of a mobile app that tracks appliance use for shared households.
sideProjects.title: Houserules

workExperience.heading: Operations Intern at Samsara
workExperience.description: Created a new pricing system for all US/Canadian hardware shipments, saving 200 hours annually.
workExperience.title: Operations Intern

workExperience.heading: Project Management Intern at Starbucks
workExperience.description: Created an interactive calendar app displaying business rhythms across a 450-person shared services organization.
workExperience.title: Project Management Intern

workExperience.heading: Project Management Intern at Fiveable
workExperience.description:
Standardized support ticketing, resulting in an 85% decrease in average time to resolution.

Led a user education initiative that increased participation in a cohort-based program by 25%.

Conducted user acceptance testing for six features, translating product feedback + bug reports into customer needs.

Created a process to audit vendor spend, saving $30k the year it was implemented.

Trained 50+ employees on new project management software.
workExperience.title: Project Management Intern

workExperience.heading: Leadership Development Intern at The Foster School of Business
workExperience.description: Created a first-of-its-kind internship. Made changes to curriculum and scheduling that increased the course completion rate by 50% compared to the last cohort.
workExperience.title: Leadership Development Intern

Extracurriculars.heading: Senior VP at Delta Sigma Pi
Extracurriculars.description: Led recruiting efforts for DSP, a professional fraternity facilitating professional development & community building.
Extracurriculars.title: Senior VP

Extracurriculars.heading: Founding Member at UW Product/Project/Program Management Association
Extracurriculars.description: Creating community around students interested in careers within product, program, and project management.
Extracurriculars.title: Founding Member

Extracurriculars.heading: Vice President at Husky Run Club
Extracurriculars.description: Raised $9000 for UW's recreational distance running club. Also managed spending/fundraising, and record-keeping.
Extracurriculars.title: VP

education.heading: BA, Business Administration at University of Washington
education.description: Sometimes went to class. Always drank coffee.
